passive_1: Damaging an enemy champion with an ability creates an explosion at their location after a 0.5-second delay, dealing 10 (+15% AP)(+3% of each target's maximum health) magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters (10 second cooldown).

Damaging an enemy champion with an ability creates an explosion at their location after a 0.5-second delay, dealing 10 (+20% AP)(+3% of each target's maximum health) magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters (10 second cooldown).

Damaging an enemy champion with an ability creates an explosion at their location after a 0.5-second delay, dealing 20 (+20% AP)(+4% of each target's maximum health) magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters (8 / 7 / 6 (based on level) second cooldown).

Damaging an enemy champion with an ability creates an explosion at their location after a 0.5-second delay, dealing 50 (+15% AP)(+3% of each target's maximum health) magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters (9 â€“ 6 (based on level) second cooldown).
passive_2: Consumes a charge to place a  Stealth Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop (4 charges; 600 range).
passive_3: Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
